subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Robert Garrigus holed out a wedge for eagle on the 16th hole, then finished with two big drives to set up easy birdies for a 10-under par 63 to take a one-shot lead.
snippet: Robert Garrigus holed out a wedge for eagle on the 16th hole, then finished with two big drives to set up easy birdies for a 10-under par 63 to take a one-shot lead.
